div.p: There are three kinds of value sets:

ol.li: A value set that defines it's own codes as a Code System
A value set that is composed of codes from other code systems
A value set that has been expanded into a single set of codes ready for use in a UI

div.p: A value set resource of kind "composition" is directly mappable to a CTS2 value set definition and an automated transform should be possible in order to use a CTS2 server to provide value set functionality
